messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Photo Album from Shannon: Enjoy my online photos
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/03 1:52:45 PM, davenshan@mindspring.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/03 1:52:45 PM, davenshan@... writes:

<< I put my hesfes piccies on photo thingy but can't get it to share

with the group. How do I do that? >>

Something to do with hedgehogs.


(HesFes is a big homeschooling campout they have in England every year.
Piccies is like "pix," slang. Piccies are to pix as telly is to TV.
Photo Thingy, some online photo site, I guess.)

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Photo Album from Shannon: Enjoy my online photos
messages.msgSnippet: ... photos, ... Thanks for the compliment on our house, Sandra! It is hard to picture from the photos, I have to agree. You (and anyone coming to Phoenix in
messages.messageBody:
SandraDodd@... wrote:


>There's also Karin from Phoenix.
>I saw photos of their round house. It's hard to totally picture from
photos,
>but it's a work of art! >>

Thanks for the compliment on our house, Sandra! It is hard to picture from
the photos, I have to agree. You (and anyone coming to Phoenix in the
future) will just have to come and see it for yourself sometime!

Karin

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Photo Album from Shannon: Enjoy my online photos
messages.messageBody:
"Shannon" <davenshan@...> wrote:

<<I've been to Karin's house. It is really neat! even irl, it is hard to
GET
just from looking at the front.but once she took me around back, I could see
how it was built. They (the builders) put a facade on it to make it look
like a regular house. So you'd never know it was a round house just by
looking. I thought I was at the wrong house when I pulled up to it. But
then Karin came out. So I knew I was in the right place. :o) >>

Hi Shannon!

Gosh, I just signed back on to the list today (after going no-mail for the
week we were gone) and I see discussion about me and my house. LOL

I went and looked at your photo album pictures and they turned out great! I
love all your added little captions, too. Then I saw the picture you took of
me and Bryan - I didn't even know you took that! I was too busy feeding my
face, but I guess Bryan noticed and even smiled for the pic. :-)

Thanks for sharing those pictures! Can't believe that was only a week ago.
It seems like it was at least a month ago, for some reason.

Karin

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-Discussion] Photo Album from Shannon: Enjoy my online photos
messages.msgSnippet: Oh yes, I had forgotten Karen and Brian were in there.  And also Elissa.  I ve been to Karin s house.  It is really neat!  even irl, it is hard to GET just
messages.messageBody:
Oh yes, I had forgotten Karen and Brian were in there. And also Elissa. I'
ve been to Karin's house. It is really neat! even irl, it is hard to GET
just from looking at the front.but once she took me around back, I could see
how it was built. They (the builders) put a facade on it to make it look
like a regular house. So you'd never know it was a round house just by
looking. I thought I was at the wrong house when I pulled up to it. But
then Karin came out. So I knew I was in the right place. :o)

Shannon Buckley
Mom to Connor 3-15-97, Carsten born at home 4-27-99/5-19-00 and Quinn born
at home 8-08-02

-----Original Message-----
From: Sandra

There's also Karin from Phoenix.
I saw photos of their round house. It's hard to totally picture from
photos,
but it's a work of art!

Thanks, Shannon!

Some photos I pulled and pasted into notes I had (e-mail or bio notes) of
the
people.
It will help me with names and faces next year! (I hope)

Sandra

messages.subject: Photo Album from Shannon: Enjoy my online photos
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, here are the pictures I took at the conference.  They are mostly of my son, Quinn.  But there are some of others, like Sandra and Ren and Madeline.  Enjoy!
messages.messageBody:
Ok, here are the pictures I took at the conference. They are mostly of my son, Quinn. But there are some of others, like Sandra and Ren and Madeline. Enjoy!

You're invited to view these photos online at Ofoto!
Just click on View Photos to get started.
http://www.ofoto.com/I.jsp?c=205pln7.58zdtscn&x=1&y=-rwkrkd

If you'd like to save these shared pictures for easy
future viewing, just sign in or create a new account.
You'll also be able to add comments to the photos
and order Kodak prints of your favorites.

For a limited time, all 4x6" prints are just 29 cents!
Sale ends November 5th.
Enjoy!

Instructions: Click view photos to begin. If you're
an existing Ofoto member you'll be asked to sign
in. If not, you can join Ofoto for free.
